Modern life can drain your energy, leaving you feeling fatigued and unbalanced. This session is designed to help you restore vitality through an energizing yet deeply relaxing yoga practice.

In this session, you will:

  • Practice dynamic flows to boost circulation and awaken your body
  • Learn breathing techniques to enhance energy levels and mental clarity
  • Experience deep relaxation through guided meditation and restorative poses
  • Explore self-care rituals that promote long-term well-being

The session will conclude with a soothing Yoga Nidra session, allowing you to fully absorb the benefits and leave feeling recharged and centered.

Price: 45€

record.field: Prenatal Yoga for Comfort and Connection

Pregnancy is a time of transformation, both physically and emotionally. This prenatal yoga session is designed to support expectant mothers in building strength, relieving tension, and fostering a deep connection with their baby.

In this session, you will:

  • Learn gentle yoga postures to ease common pregnancy discomforts
  • Practice breathing techniques to promote relaxation and prepare for birth
  • Strengthen your body safely to support a growing belly
  • Connect with other expectant mothers in a warm and supportive space
  • End with a guided relaxation to leave you feeling nourished and empowered

Whether you're new to yoga or an experienced practitioner, this session offers a safe and soothing environment to honor your body’s needs during pregnancy.

Price: 40€
